documents.document: @Greeneil83 decent game this!
@albioncoaching @NCR_fc thanks for your support mate, successful couple of years! All the best for your new venture
@PhillyClarke1 dislocated ankle, fibula spiral fracture x4....messy! Full recovery though mate. Great to hear you are making decent progress
@PhillyClarke1 yeah not bad mate, lost on wkend but went 7 unbeaten before that. Tight league this year! Hows the leg?
@PhillyClarke1 using a 50p fly-away from the local newsagents there!

Big wkend of football in Napier. Get along to the @NCR_fc Lotto U19 Tournament, Park Island. Good luck to all clubs and players #NapierU19
Decent 45mins from #AllWhites. High pressure creating a few opportunities. Tactically brave...Good to watch! @NZ_Football #MEXvNZL

Quality 45mins of football. Utd outplayed and struggling with City's transition pressure.Bravo's lost his head though so game on! #MUFCvMCFC

@thekiwicanary @Dale_Warburton don't even joke about it!

Absolutely gutted! Proud of all the @TeamWelly boys efforts. Congrats to @AucklandCity_FC, too good on the day. @OFCfootball #OCLFinal
